mail_body:
Hi [Employee Name],

We're so excited to officially welcome you to [Company Name]'s relocation program! We understand that moving can be a stressful process, and we're here to make it as smooth and enjoyable as possible for you.

This email confirms your upcoming Welcome Call with your dedicated Relocation Specialist, Sarah Miller. During this call, Sarah will discuss your specific needs and preferences, answer any questions you may have, and outline the next steps in your relocation journey.

We're confident that with Sarah's expertise and our comprehensive services, you'll be settling into your new home in no time!

We look forward to speaking with you soon!

Best regards,

The [Relocation Company Name] Team
